data.title: Art to Market Special Delivery
data.description: At the beginning of the round, use this Special Delivery lineup to combo your utility with a teammate's to get an early round advantage.

data.title: B Long Armageddon + Salvo
data.description: Clear out B Long with this simple Armageddon lineup, alongside a Salvo to catch players looking to avoid it within the B Long pocket. This is best used when retaking the site after the spike has been planted.

data.title: Art to A Main Special Delivery
data.description: Early into the round, use this Special Delivery lineup for an aggressive peek towards Main or to combine utility with a teammate.
